覞字的基本解释

覞
yào
两人相对而视。
普视。

覞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yào］
［《廣韻》弋照切，去笑，云。］
并见。《说文·覞部》：“覞，竝視也。”段玉裁注：“按《祭義》：見以蕭光，見閒以俠甒。注云：見及見閒，皆當爲覸，字之誤也。覸不見於許書，蓋即覞字，謂蕭光與燔燎並見，俠甒與肝肺首心並見也。見者，視也。”北周卫元嵩《元包经·太阳》：“覞于醜，冏于垠。”苏源明传：“覞于醜，觀夫衆也。冏于垠，照夫遠也。”一说，两人相对而视。参阅饶炯《〈说文解字〉部首订》：“并視，非二人同視一物，謂二人相對爲視也。”

覞字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覞； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1135第13
【唐韻】【集韻】?弋笑切，音耀。【說文】?視也。【元包經】晉覞于醜。傳曰：觀夫衆也。【類篇】或作?。　又【集韻】昌召切，弨去聲。普視貌。　又【集韻】施隻切，音釋。昌石切，音尺。義?同。

覞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
覞字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
覞
yào
The two looked at each other.
Ubishi.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yào］
["Guang Yun" Yi cuts, laughs, cloud. ]
See you also. "Shuowen·Xianbu": "You, and look at it." Duan Yucai's note: "According to "Sacrificial Righteousness": see Xiaoguang, see Xianxie. Note: See and see leisure, all should be regarded as Yu, the word is wrong. Yu is not seen in Xu Shu, the cover is the word, saying that Xiao Guang meets Burning Liao, Xia Zeng and liver, lungs, head and heart are also seen. Those who see it, see also." Bei Zhou Wei Yuansong" "Yuan Bao Jing·Sun": "You are in Chou, and you are in Yin." Su Yuanming's biography: "You are in Chou, and you can see the husband and the public. You are in Yu Yin, and the husband is far away." Once said, the two looked at each other. Please refer to Rao Jiong's "Shuowen Jiezi" Radical Order: "Concurrently, not two people treat one thing at the same time, it is said that two people see each other as the same thing."

yào, chào, shì
